item.title: Apache SINGA as a Top-Level Project
item.description:
The Apache Software Foundation (ASF) recently announced Apache SINGA as a Top-Level Project.

The Apache Software Foundation (ASF), the all-volunteer developers, stewards, and incubators of more than 350 Open Source projects and initiatives, announced today Apache® SINGA™ as a Top-Level Project (TLP).

Apache SINGA is an Open Source distributed, scalable machine learning library. The project was originally developed in 2014 at the National University of Singapore, and was submitted to the Apache Incubator in March 2015.

item.title: Foodlg Powered by SINGA
item.description: Food(lg), the mobile app to help patients with prediabetes, is powered by SINGA and this app can now be downloaded on the APP Store or Google Play. Watch this video of Food(lg) for more details.

item.title: Singapore IMDA Presentation
item.description: A tutorial on SINGA was given at Singapore Infocomm Media Development Authority (IMDA) on 16 August, 2019.

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2019
item.description: SINGA participated in mentoring the Google Summer of Code 2019 project SpamAssassin: Statistical Classifier Plugin.

item.title: EU FOSSA Apache Hackathon
item.description: SINGA participated at EU FOSSA Apache Hackathon in Brussels on 4 and 5 May 2019.

item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description: Version 2.0.0 is now available, 20 April, 2019. Download SINGA v2.0.0

item.title: DISI Trento Presentation
item.description: SINGA was presented at DISI, University of Trento, Italy on 14 December 2018.

item.title: DIBRIS Genoa Presentation
item.description: SINGA was presented at DIBRIS, University of Genoa, Italy on 16 July 2018.9.

item.title: Version 1.2.0
item.description: Version 1.2.0 is now available, 6 June, 2018. Download SINGA v1.2.0

item.title: Version 1.1.0
item.description: Version 1.1.0 is now available, 12 Feb, 2017. Download SINGA v1.1.0
